definition: trusted/intimate/(of the emperor) to visit/variant of 幸[xing4]
to exist/to deposit/to store/to keep/to survive

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: I worked with Viktor Frankl, a Nazi prison camp survivor, for many years.
sentences.chinese: 长期以来，我曾帮助过一位纳粹集中营幸存者。

sentences.english: It is not clear how many survived the collapse of the three-storey building.
sentences.chinese: 倒塌的三层楼下还有多少幸存者目前还不得而知。

sentences.english: Workers built shelters for survivors whose homes had been destroyed.
sentences.chinese: 救援人员为那些家园被毁的幸存者盖起了避难所。

sentences.english: The survivors wandered about the jungle for days before being picked up by a search party.
sentences.chinese: 幸存者在丛林中游荡了好几天，才被搜索队救出来。

sentences.english: 'How fantastic to be up above ground again, ' said a 27-r-old survivor who was brought up.
sentences.chinese: 一名被救出的27岁幸存者说，能再回到地上太好了。

sentences.english: And we also had the privilege of meeting with some of their families, as well as some of the courageous survivors.
sentences.chinese: 我们还有幸会见了部分罹难者家属和无畏的幸存者。

sentences.english: A man named Ma Yuanjiang was the first survivor saved on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 一位叫马远江的男人是周二救出的第一位幸存者。

sentences.english: Inform coast radio station about destination of vessel with survivors.
sentences.chinese: 告诉海岸电台有幸存者船的目的港。

sentences.english: Of the survivors, 113 were hospitalised, including 21 in critical condition.
sentences.chinese: 幸存者中，113人被送往医院，21人伤势严重。

sentences.english: Thousands of survivors lived in tent camps or temporary housing for months. (Read by Nelly Min.
sentences.chinese: 数千名幸存者连续几个月都住在帐篷或临时房屋里。

sentences.english: Twelve million cancer survivors are living proof such a goal is possible.
sentences.chinese: 十二万癌症幸存者都生动地证明这一目标是可能的。

sentences.english: Reports of cell-phone calls from the few survivors pleading for help.
sentences.chinese: 据报道几乎没有幸存者用手机求救。

sentences.english: She was one of the lucky ones at the zoo, in the north of the city.
sentences.chinese: 希拉是位于城北的这家动物园的“幸存者”之一。

sentences.english: Strange BedfellowsSurvivors carry salvaged mattresses near earthquake-ravaged Beichuan County in China's Sichuan province.
sentences.chinese: 地震的幸存者扛着救灾床垫走在北川县城外。

sentences.english: Each survivor got $25 and a train ticket.
sentences.chinese: 每位幸存者获得25美元补偿和一张火车票。

definition: sufferer/a victim of a calamity/a person in distress
sb who sacrifices himself/sacrificial victim/sb who is expendable
